Reviews.Title: “Honest, Friendly Service and Top Notch Facilities”
Reviews.Author: FO_Stanley
Reviews.Content: finished 10 day stay kempinski property needless size huge plus spacious kitchen terrace beds die comfortable sleeping beds home usually hotel complimentary transfers atlantis appreciated beach childrens pool pool wonderful staff eager please definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Best beach and view”
Reviews.Author: Lin C
Reviews.Content: friend romantic stay noisy calm relaxing inside palm views dubai burj al arab khalifa marina etc fantastic breakfast nice little bar funny pianist romantic delighful dinners nice garden wander watch stars nice look european palace beach seen inside kept clean organize water amazing views die visit didn´t expect cold dubai summer round lucky wind thanks

Reviews.Title: “Excellent luxury hotel for a family”
Reviews.Author: nathan c
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights wife 2 reasons hotels cater families arrival wow factor service moment arrived left excellent 5 quality hotel spotless extremely extravagent amazing views lagoon ocean isnt crowded couldnt fail relax complete contrast booked atlantis 1 night stay feels staying train station ebb flow stressfull night recommend kempinski utter luxury quality

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful new hotel but very limited dining options for its size.”
Reviews.Author: Buddyboyy
Reviews.Content: stayed nights impressive looking hotel february half term children aged 14 11 real wow factor arrival especially rolls royce lamborghini parked outside main entrance staff welcoming friendly promptly shown impressive 2 bedroom suite bathrooms spacious extremely comfortable beds flat screen tvs fitted kitchen superb pool beach excellent stay dining options limited especially half board option little selection suited children childrens menu offer suprised restaurant breakfast plenty selection lunchtime posed waiters food half board poolside menu available choice producing daily menu half board option proved difficult occasion none staff daily beach bbq available half board option food hotel provide half board childrens menus despite hotel 6 months staff training dining addressing occasion cutlery changed times seen food recommend staying bed breakfast basis eat evening amazing shopping malls taking free shuttle bus service taxi note children allowed bar dining facility enjoy pre dinner drink unless table hotel booked british airways add package price excellent transfers bmw vehicle hotel cars airport audi mercedes ba flight schedule world traveller food emirates

Reviews.Title: “WoW Facility & Very Poor Services”
Reviews.Author: komosani
Reviews.Content: hotel considered luxury hotels dubai facilities beach structured top notch furnitures justify poor service ignorance requests didn’t feel valuable customers stayed family suites 8 nights paid 40000 treated normal valuable customer disappointed talked management times unfortunately response arrival home sent letter kempinski management didn’t feedback add housekeeping horrible

Reviews.Title: “Unpleasant Experience, unprofessional service”
Reviews.Author: Madhan S
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights celebrate occassion stay totally unpleasant looks fabulous outside worth feel staff reminded times requested lacks training worth stay despite sending complaint management action

Reviews.Title: “A relaxing stay at Kempinski”
Reviews.Author: JaysonLO
Reviews.Content: hotel september stayed twobedroom suite spacious information russian german service expectations prices private beach pool nice nearby found nearby provided complimentary drive atlantis spent time

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels I've ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: TKay_11
Reviews.Content: stayed kempinski palm jumeirah six nights december 2011 six nights 2011 paradise fault hotel staff including concierge reception restaurant bar staff housekeeping lifeguards spa staff kids club exceptional service impeccable hotel location stunning paradise views suite amazing terrace terrace living views key landmarks dubai including atlantis hotel burj al arab burj khalifa twin towers financial district etc dubai amazing hotels kempinski solely level service received looking ultimate luxury relaxation dubai highly recommend stay hotel disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Best holiday in my life”
Reviews.Author: kryspin
Reviews.Content: absolutely unforgettable stay life staff help fantastic location palm jumeirah try trip spa gym feel paradise thanks

Reviews.Title: “Great family stay”
Reviews.Author: Eamonn W
Reviews.Content: planned stay kempinski palm 5 nights family late october stayed kempinski mall emirates previous month business heard hotel palm advised hotel soft alcohol premises stay sacrifice huge previous visits normally night anyway stock bar duty free anyway impression arrival wow look hotel outside stunning reception late night wasnt impressive building reception shops brought bed huge looked fantastic bedrooms spacious plenty family 5 huge reception kitchen outside spacious balcony reception smelled cigarette smoke butts empty packet left outside patio normally wouldnt complain strong smell requested outside jacuzzi told none available decided bed late management day day hold complaint change delivered promise upgraded 4 bed suite huge stunned size 4 huge bedrooms huge reception upstairs 3 patios jacuzzi amazing service excellent times slow beach pool beach nice extremely clean looked enjoyed stay staff reception especially norman feel welcome overall highly recommend kempinski palm hope

Reviews.Title: “not good!”
Reviews.Author: caroline w
Reviews.Content: planned stay week left 24 hours informed soft noisy construction pool waited 45 minutes coke food expensive below standard five star hotel salad tuna received email days prior arrival hotel license staf friendly apologizing hotel suite hope kempinski sorts staff shortage soon

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely perfect in every way!”
Reviews.Author: Marcelina_56
Reviews.Content: soothing experience plan truly rejuvinating experience indeed hospitality resort breakfast chefs care family enjoyed extreme wonderful experience days spent kempinski palm jumeirah

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Retreat on the Palm”
Reviews.Author: jillyp4perfect
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel educational trip soft dry hotel 10th october approx licenses plan bar etc stayed bedroom suite door wow factor beautiful elegantly designed parisian feel decorated blues silvers fantastic furniture kitchen plenty facilities 3 balconies sea views atlantis view beautiful morning curtains gorgeous setting overlooking villa properties honour looking finished standard family holiday jacuzzis balcony imagine sitting watching sunset staff friendly food chef loves experiment la carte dishes beach pool beautiful complex completed plans 18 approx eateries gathered mini mall style completed comment kids club children larger near future lots safe kids overall based night stay return
